comment._content: some of the Empress of Ireland bodies are buried in Rimouski www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Empres...;

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
From Wikipedia,
Rimouski is a Canadian city in the central part of Bas-Saint-Laurent region in eastern Quebec. It is located on the south shore of the Saint Lawrence River at the mouth of the Rimouski River, north-east of Quebec City.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
nudecowboy & swanq:

Thanks for the information on this sad event.  Rimouski, Quebec is where the survivors and recovered dead from the sinking of the Empress of Ireland were initially taken prior to transport to Quebec City.  We will expand the descriptive information to tell the story in a more complete manner.
